setting.time: 64 AD, late afternoon, immediately after severe storm has passed
setting.location: Aventine Hill overlooking Rome, elevated viewpoint after rain
setting.weather: Storm clearing to reveal brilliant rainbow, fresh clean air, puddles reflecting blue sky

characters.appearance: Christian mother with child, woman in her twenties and child about five, faces bright with hope for future
characters.clothing: Woman in simple blue tunic with Christian cross pendant, child in white tunic symbolizing innocence, both clean after persecution ended
characters.position: Standing on hillside overlooking Rome after Nero's death, pointing toward new dawn
characters.action: Teaching child about Christ's victory over evil, child laughing with joy at freedom to worship, both praising God for deliverance

scene.mainElements: Brilliant sunrise arcing across sky symbolizing Christian hope, entire city of Rome spread below free from tyrant's rule, ground reflecting golden light of new era and God's promise
scene.details: Everything gleaming in golden morning light, air crystal clear in new era of freedom, colors extraordinarily vivid in hope, warmth rising from earth freed from tyranny, fresh scent of blooming flowers and clean stone, birds singing songs of liberation, world appearing renewed by Christ's victory
scene.background: Rome below looking clean and bright, aqueducts with water cascading from storm runoff, hills sharp and clear in washed air, dramatic clouds clearing to reveal blue sky
scene.atmosphere: Joy and spiritual renewal after persecution ends, world refreshed by Christ's triumph, sense of new Christian beginning, divine promise inspiring awe, fresh hope filling air and faithful hearts

composition.cameraAngle: Wide shot showing figures against sunrise with Rome spread below
composition.focus: Mother and child silhouetted against brilliant sunrise with liberated city below
composition.depth: Foreground hillside grass with morning dew, middle ground mother and child pointing at sunrise, background liberated Rome under golden sky
